definitions.definition: Laurus nobilis, an evergreen shrub having aromatic leaves of a lanceolate shape, with clusters of small, yellowish white flowers in their axils.
(chiefly in the plural) Honor, distinction, fame.
definitions.example: to win laurels; to crown with laurels

definitions.definition: Any plant of the family Lauraceae.
Any of various plants of other families that resemble laurels.
An English gold coin made in 1619, and so called because the king's head on it was crowned with laurel.
To decorate with laurel, especially with a laurel wreath.
Honors. From the Ancient Greek practice of crowning victors with a branch from the laurel bush, sacred to Apollo.
